data.name: Happy’s Humble Burger Farm: Fountain of Guts (OST)
data.detailed_description: Fountain of Guts is a blistering, white-hot serving of METAL. This album blends vibes of Nu-Metal, Industrial Metal, Thrash Metal, Alternative Rock, Grunge, and even hints of Black Metal and Death Metal.
data.about_the_game: Fountain of Guts is a blistering, white-hot serving of METAL. This album blends vibes of Nu-Metal, Industrial Metal, Thrash Metal, Alternative Rock, Grunge, and even hints of Black Metal and Death Metal.
